itunes:title: Episode 724 - DB Sports Companion Show 11/24/20 - 2020 College Basketball Preview Show
title: Episode 724 - DB Sports Companion Show 11/24/20 - 2020 College Basketball Preview Show
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome "Dirty Dan and Hot Bob" who will be hosting our College Basketball show on our new Drinkin' Bros Sports feed to predict the upcoming season, including our "way too early" Championship teams, and we give our picks o...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome "Dirty Dan and Hot Bob" who will be hosting our College Basketball show on our new Drinkin' Bros Sports feed to predict the upcoming season, including our "way too early" Championship teams, and we give our picks on this week's NFL and College Football spreads.  Ross makes another epic Notre Dame bet.

ghostbed.com/drinkinbros
